description: This Chandrani Haar seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The emeralds are meticulously selected for their vibrant color and clarity. The CZ stones provide exceptional brilliance, making this piece a stunning addition to any jewelry collection. It's a statement piece embodying heritage and contemporary style.
